name: Mentalfest
description:
Static Void & Corpse Collider are playing! Unfortunately not many tickets are left.

Luckily you have a BrainWave Hacker® to read and manipulate other queuers!

Tune in to their brainwaves with your frequency knob (left joystick) and finetune with your amplitude knob (right joystick) to lock on. Then only a mere pull of your controller trigger will send that annoying fan away!
